name: "Sly 3" - "An Opera Of Fear" (PS2) Online Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Five Foot Five Inches.

	You can see this when Octavio is in jail.  They take pictures of his profile.  Without his hat he is 5 ft 5 in.  With his hat, he appears 5 ft 6 in.

questions.text: How many tar pumps does Murray have to crush for the gang?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	When Murray smashes all the tar pumps, he starts to remember how he loves destruction.  One tar pump is located right in front of the gang's hideout, one by a bridge where a gondola comes by, another by the opera house, and the other two are located at other locations in the city.

questions.text: Which of the following was never mentioned in this level?
questions.explanation:
Florence.

	This level is in Venice.  While talking to Tony "The Killer" B, Sly mentions he was from Rome.  When he learns Tony B's knickname, he says he was the bully of the playground from here to Sicily.

questions.text: Is it possible to see the Eiffel Tower from this level?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The Eiffel Tower is off in the distance, and you can only see it from certain locations, but it is indeed there.  Although you are in Venice, you can see the tower, which is in Paris.

questions.text: Is it possible to climb to the very top of Octavio's opera house?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Although you cannot climb it in the actual level, you can other times.  The two player game, "Cops and Robbers," is set in this level.  You are able to use mega-jump a minimum of two times to get to the top of the structure, and three times to land on the tip.

questions.text: Can you climb on top of any of the blimps?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Again, you cannot actually do this from the level.  You have to be in two player mode for "Cops and Robbers" in order to do so.  From on top of the opera house, you can jump down right onto the blimp.

questions.text: Is it possible to enter the opera house for your second time without being caught by a guard?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Although you can get to the door without being caught, you must get caught while in disguise in order for the guard to open the door for you.  The first time you get in, however, you go to a side door into the air ducts.  The second time, you must enter, in disguise, through the front door.  When you are inside, even if you will not be seen by any guards, your mission will fail by taking off your disguise, so be careful!

questions.text: After you have blown up the Octavio sign, does it still move?
questions.correct: Yes, the right arm still moves
options: No, the left arm was completely destroyed
No, the right arm was completely destroyed
Yes, the left arm still moves
questions.explanation:
Yes, the right arm still moves.

	Before the sign is blown up, Octavio has a cigar in his left hand.  It smokes from one side.  The right hand waves to all who can see.  When the sign has been blown up, the whole things smokes, but the right hand does indeed continue to move, although half the arm was blown to pieces.

questions.text: When the video that shows Octavio being overrun by a rockband plays, how many rockers are in the band?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	There were three rockers in this video.  Octavio was very upset.  The three rockers were the profiles of a drummer, two guitarists, and the lead singer.  This is what caused Octavio to pump tar into the water of Venice.  He wanted revenge for all the new rock lovers, and he wanted all to become opera lovers again.

questions.text: Which of the following IS a Coffee House password?
questions.explanation:
One One Three.

	113 was a Coffee House password.  This password unlocked one of three of the blueprints for Octavio's tar pumping plan.  Sly was able to help Bently break into all three.  The first guard was pleased that the second shift came early, the second guy wanted to be buried in his mother's pasta sauce, and Sly was able to make it to the third by guessing Tony B's knickname. The third coffee house activates an alarm, so you have to run back to the hideout as quickly as possible.  Sly couldn't get over the pasta sauce guard.  He didn't think there was such a thing as pasta sauce that good.
